content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Hassan. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I am dependable and responsible tenant. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you propose a rental price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for letting me know your position, Hassan. As the landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains, so I am looking for a rental price that reflects the value of the apartment. Can you provide me with an offer based on your understanding of the market and the apartment's condition?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am not sure about the market price. Can you give me a rough estimate?

TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible tenant and be on good terms with me. However, I am unable to accept this offer at this time. I believe that the rental price I am looking for is higher than the one you have proposed. Is there any possibility for us to come to an agreement on a rental price that is mutually beneficial?
name: Heinrich Heine
